com.soen6441.core.play

类 PlayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen6441.core.play.PlayManager

  • public class PlayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class PalyManager will handle the task of saving the gamePlay in XML file and reading the XML file to generate gamePlay;
    版本:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    作者:
    Mohammad Ali, Chenglong Zhang

    • 方法详细资料

      • save

        public void save(java.io.File file,
                 Play play)
        The method save will save the gamePlay in the specified file
        参数:
        file - The name of the File where to save .
        play - A play object

      • read

        public Play read(java.io.File file)
        The method read will read the specified file and generate a Play object. This method will use Xpath to navigate through MapXml file. Requires jaxen 1.1-beta-6.jar located in Dom4j lib folder.
        参数:
        file - The name of the File form which to read
        返回:
        Play
